thread.title: Whitney Houston stars in Bobbi Kristina video | DailyTelegraph
thread.title_full: Whitney Houston stars in Bobbi Kristina video | DailyTelegraph

author: Network Writers
title: Whitney Houston stars in Bobbi Kristina video | DailyTelegraph
text:
TYLER Perry has shared a tribute to Bobbi Kristina Brown a month after her death, including previously unreleased images with mum, Whitney Houston. “The Houston estate asked if I would share this tribute that I put together for Bobbi Kristina’s private funeral. On behalf of the Brown and Houston families, we would all like to thank you for your prayers and support. God bless,” he wrote on Facebook.
The Houston estate asked if I would share this tribute that I put together for Bobbi Kristina's private funeral. On behalf of the Brown and Houston families, we would all like to thank you for your prayers and support. God bless,
Posted by Tyler Perry on Friday, 4 September 2015 The video, entitled A Celebration of Our Princess , starts with a Quote: from Bobbi Kristina.
Other Stories Jarryd Hayne: My life in the NFL More Sports 0 comments Thorpey is buff, bronzed and looking for love Nsw Meet Bachelorette’s strapping suitors Television 0 comments Tears flow as young crash victim farewelled Nsw 0 comments ‘Sexual tension through the roof’ Tennis 49ers cut five players — Hayne safe Us Sports 0 comments “I hope you feel my love, pain, beauty, agony at times, blessings all the time,” the Quote: reads.
“No one understands me. And I don’t expect them to, but I will try to spread my love and my story through words and this blessing of a powerful voice mum has given me.”
The video montage, which runs while Houston’s song You Were Loved plays in the background, shows Bobbi Kristina in some previously unseen family snaps.
Family ... Bobby Brown and Whitney Houston and their daughter, Bobbi Kristina Brown. Picture: Supplied She was the only child of Whitney Houston and Bobby Brown.
Bobbi Kristina was rushed to hospital and placed in a medically-induced coma on January 31 after she was discovered facedown in a bathtub at the home she shared with boyfriend Nick Gordon.
She died at a hospice on July 26 — just three years after her mother died aged 48 in a bathtub at a hotel in Beverly Hills.
Nick Gordon is accused of foul play in his girlfriend’s death — and is now the subject of a family lawsuit.
Remembering Krissi ... Bobbi Kristina Brown shares her thoughts. Picture: Supplied Originally published as Houston features in video tribute
